title: Computer-Programming-2
description: This repo consists of programming assignments given in the 1st year spring semester of computer engineering. All programs are written in C++. The homework document given in each folder can be accessed.

title: Data-Structures
description: This repo contains the data structures I learned in the computer engineering data structures course and the homework I did about them.

title: Introduction-to-Microcomputers-Lab
description: This repository is opened for homework and answers for the microcomputers lab course.

title: Operating-Systems
description: This repository has been opened to learn UNIX commands and understand basic operating system concepts. It includes the projects given in the operating systems laboratory course.

title: React-Projects
description: This repo contains the projects and notes taken from the courses watched to learn technologies such as react next.js.
